name: sleep-ai-full-project
description: Professional Sleep Tracking & Analysis Platform with ML Predictions

scripts.start: concurrently "cd backend-node && npm start" "cd microservice-predict && python predict_service.py" "cd sleep-ai-frontend-clean-premium && npm run dev"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend-node && npm install && cd ../microservice-predict && pip install -r requirements.txt && cd ../sleep-ai-frontend-clean-premium && npm install

author: SleepAI Team
